DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate how well the immuno response against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y lasts in children who were vaccinated with MenACWY as infants.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Meningococcal ACWY Immune Response in Children Aged 40 and 60 Months
DOC.criteria: Followon, healthy 40, 60 months old participants who have completed the V59P5 study and are in good health Control subjects: healthy 60 months old who had received a complete MenC immunization course Subjects with any serious, acute or chronic progressive disease
